name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ATS Resume Builder | Customize your Resume AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ATS Resume Builder with AI, ATS resume checker & ATS score to build your Resume with Latest AI, Standout from the Crowd

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝐀𝑻 𝐒 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗺𝗲 𝗕𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗔𝗜: 𝗖𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗺𝗶𝘇𝗲 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗺𝗲𝘀 & 𝗖𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝗹𝗲𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗽𝗲𝗿 𝗷𝗼𝗯 𝗽𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝗮𝘂𝘁𝗼𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗰𝗮𝗹𝗹𝘆 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗔𝗜 & 𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗻𝗱𝗼𝘂𝘁 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗖𝗿𝗼𝘄𝗱  99% 𝘼𝙏𝙎 𝙎𝙘𝙤𝙧𝙚

𝐖𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐰𝐢𝐥𝐥 𝐠𝐞𝐭 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐞𝐱𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧:

✅ Generate customized ATS friendly Resume with AI
✅ Generate customized ATS friendly cover letters with AI
✅ Check the ATS score
✅ Customize Resume with AI snippet
✅ Customize Cover letters with AI
✅ Download ATS friendly Resumes with 99% ATS Score
✅ Download ATS friendly Cover Letters with 99% ATS Score


𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐜𝐫𝐢𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧:

Create a Winning ATS-Friendly Resume with AI: Build Your Professional Resume Using an Advanced ATS Resume Builder, ATS Checker, and ATS Score Analysis. Leverage Cutting-Edge AI Technology to Craft a Resume That Not Only Highlights Your Skills and Achievements but Also Meets the Requirements of Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS). Our AI-powered platform ensures your resume is optimized with the right keywords, formatting, and structure to pass ATS filters effortlessly. Stand out from the crowd, improve your chances of landing interviews, and secure your dream job with a polished, AI-enhanced ATS resume designed to outperform the competition.


💬 Support 
if you have any issue or bug please contact us at support@atsresumebuilderai.com


💡 F.A.Q

𝟭. 𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝗔𝗧𝗦 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗺𝗲 𝗕𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗔𝗜?

ATS Resume Builder AI is a Chrome extension designed to help job seekers create customized, ATS-friendly resumes and cover letters tailored to specific job posts using AI technology. It ensures your application stands out with an impressive ATS score of up to 99%.

𝟮. 𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗱𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝗔𝗧𝗦 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗳𝗼𝗿?

ATS stands for Applicant Tracking System. It’s software used by employers to screen and filter resumes. Our extension ensures your documents are optimized to pass these systems effectively.


𝟯. 𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝗜 𝗱𝗼 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗲𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻?

With ATS Resume Builder AI, you can:

✅ Generate customized, ATS-friendly resumes using AI.
✅ Create tailored cover letters optimized for each job posting.
✅ Check the ATS score of your documents.
✅ Use AI snippets to fine-tune resumes and cover letters.
✅ Download resumes and cover letters with up to 99% ATS scores.


𝟰. 𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗱𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗔𝗜 𝗰𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗺𝗶𝘇𝗲 𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗺𝗲𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗰𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝗹𝗲𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀?

The AI analyzes the job description, keywords, and requirements and matches them with your skills, experience, and qualifications. This ensures each resume and cover letter is tailored to fit the job.


𝟱. 𝗪𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝗮𝗻 𝗔𝗧𝗦 𝗦𝗰𝗼𝗿𝗲?

The ATS Score measures how well your resume and cover letter align with a job description. A higher ATS score increases the chances of your application passing the screening process.


𝟲. 𝗖𝗮𝗻 𝗜 𝗱𝗼𝘄𝗻𝗹𝗼𝗮𝗱 𝗺𝘆 𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗺𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗰𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝗹𝗲𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿?

Yes! You can download your ATS-friendly resume and cover letter in a professional format, ensuring they are ready to submit.


𝟳. 𝗜𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝗮 𝗹𝗶𝗺𝗶𝘁 𝘁𝗼 𝗵𝗼𝘄 𝗺𝗮𝗻𝘆 𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗺𝗲𝘀 𝗼𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝗹𝗲𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗜 𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝗰𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗲?

The limit depends on your subscription plan. The free plan may have limitations, while premium plans offer unlimited document generation and downloads.


𝟴. 𝗗𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗲𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘀𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁 𝗺𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗶𝗽𝗹𝗲 𝗷𝗼𝗯 𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀?

Absolutely! You can generate and customize resumes and cover letters for multiple job postings effortlessly.


𝟴. 𝗗𝗼𝗲𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗲𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘀𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁 𝗺𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗶𝗽𝗹𝗲 𝗷𝗼𝗯 𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀?

Yes, your data is encrypted and secure. We adhere to strict data privacy policies to ensure your information is protected.


𝟭𝟬. 𝑯𝒐𝒘 𝒅𝒐 𝑰 𝒊𝒏𝒔𝒕𝒂𝒍𝒍 𝑨𝑻𝑺 𝑹𝒆𝒔𝒖𝒎𝒆 𝑩𝒖𝒊𝒍𝒅𝒆𝒓 𝑨𝑰?

    1-  Go to the Chrome Web Store.
    2- Search for "ATS Resume Builder AI".
    3- Click "Add to Chrome".
    4- Follow the prompts to complete the installation.

𝟭𝟭. 𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗱𝗼 𝗜 𝘂𝘀𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗲𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻?

    Open the extension in your Chrome browser.
    Enter your job description and personal details.
    Use the AI tools to generate or customize your resume and cover letter.
    Download the optimized documents.

𝟭𝟮. 𝗜𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝗮 𝗳𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗮𝘃𝗮𝗶𝗹𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲?

Yes! A free version is available with basic features. For advanced customization, ATS scoring, and unlimited downloads, you can upgrade to a premium plan.


𝟭𝟯. 𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗮𝗰𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗔𝗧𝗦 𝘀𝗰𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝘃𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗱 𝗯𝘆 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗲𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻?

The ATS score is based on advanced AI algorithms and closely reflects the scoring methods used by most modern Applicant Tracking Systems.


𝟭𝟰. 𝗖𝗮𝗻 𝗜 𝗺𝗮𝗻𝘂𝗮𝗹𝗹𝘆 𝗲𝗱𝗶𝘁 𝗺𝘆 𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗺𝗲 𝗼𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝗹𝗲𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗮𝗳𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗴𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗶𝘁?

Yes! You can manually edit and customize your resume and cover letter within the extension to add a personal touch.


𝟭𝟱. 𝗪𝗵𝗼 𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝗯𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗳𝗶𝘁 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗔𝗧𝗦 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗺𝗲 𝗕𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗔𝗜?

This tool is ideal for:

    Job seekers looking to improve their job applications.
    Professionals targeting competitive roles.
    Students and recent graduates entering the job market.

𝟭𝟲. 𝑯𝒐𝒘 𝒄𝒂𝒏 𝑰 𝒈𝒆𝒕 𝒔𝒖𝒑𝒑𝒐𝒓𝒕 𝒊𝒇 𝑰 𝒆𝒏𝒄𝒐𝒖𝒏𝒕𝒆𝒓 𝒂𝒏 𝒊𝒔𝒔𝒖𝒆?

You can contact our support team through the Help/Support section in the extension or via our official support email.
